actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Virgillo C. Carandang, doctor of medicine, his wife Cecilia Tanedo Carandang, and his son Colin Carandang.

summary.text: Declares a certain individual, his wife, and two children, lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, under the Immigration and Nationality Act, notwithstanding specified restrictions of such Act pertaining to such individual's occupation.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Virgillo C. Carandang, doctor of medicine, his wife Cecilia Tanedo Carandang, and his son Colin Carandang.
